pr_title: Add warning for configured apps in dropins

timeline.bodyText:
Change
"The dropins application at location {0} cannot start because it is also configured."
to,
"The Drop-ins application at location {0} cannot start because it is also configured."
timeline.author: ManasiGandhi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -222,3 +222,6 @@ error.startAfter.cycle=CWWKZ0066E: The following applications cannot start becau
 error.startAfter.cycle.explanation=None of the applications can start because each one depends on one of the other applications to be started first.
 error.startAfter.cycle.useraction=Change the value of the startAfter attribute for applications involved in the cycle so that they do not have circular dependencies.
 
+dropins.app.also.configured=CWWKZ0067W: The dropins application at location {0} cannot start because it is also configured.

timeline.bodyText:
Change,
"An application in the server configuration specifies a location in the monitored dropins directory. "
to,
"An application in the server configuration specifies a location in the monitored Drop-ins directory. "
timeline.author: ManasiGandhi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -222,3 +222,6 @@ error.startAfter.cycle=CWWKZ0066E: The following applications cannot start becau
 error.startAfter.cycle.explanation=None of the applications can start because each one depends on one of the other applications to be started first.
 error.startAfter.cycle.useraction=Change the value of the startAfter attribute for applications involved in the cycle so that they do not have circular dependencies.
 
+dropins.app.also.configured=CWWKZ0067W: The dropins application at location {0} cannot start because it is also configured. 
+dropins.app.also.configured.explanation=An application in the server configuration specifies a location in the monitored dropins directory.

timeline.message: Add warning for configured app in dropins
Add warning for configured app in dropins
Add warning for configured app in dropins
